Dataset Name: Air Quality Index Daily Values Report
Description: This report provides daily Air Quality Index values for the specified year and location

This repository contains data on coronavirus (COVID-19) in New York City (NYC), updated daily. Data are assembled by the NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH) Incident Command System for COVID-19 Response (Surveillance and Epidemiology Branch in collaboration with Public Information Office Branch).

Dataset Name: Johns Hopkins CSSE COVID-19 Data Repository
Description: This folder contains daily time series summary tables, including confirmed, deaths and recovered. All data are from the daily case report.

Dataset Name: Hourly Traffic on Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) Bridges and Tunnels: Beginning 2010
Description: This dataset provides data showing the number of vehicles (including cars, buses, trucks and motorcycles) that pass through each of the bridges and tunnels operated by the MTA each hour of the day. The data is updated weekly.

Dataset Name: Daily Settlement of Crude Oil Futures
Description: This dataset is a time series containing daily settlement and open interest of NYMEX WTI Crude Oil futures for May 2020 delivery
